person.headline: Principal Software Architect @ OPEN TEXT TECHNOLOGIES INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED | Computer Software Engineering
person.summary:
20+ years of IT experience spanning all stages of the software development lifecycle, with a strong focus on Middleware Technologies and a passion for innovation. I bring significant hands-on experience in the exciting field of Generative AI, including practical application of Langchain, Llama Index, RAG, vector databases, Vertex API, and TensorFlow. My core technical skills include deep proficiency in Java and Golang, complemented by practical experience in Python and Clojure. As a highly capable Full Stack GCP/ AWS Microservice Architect, I excel in designing, deploying, and managing microservices in production environments (GCP, OCP on AWS) using Jenkins, Ansible, Kubernetes, Spring Boot, and Apache Cassandra. I also possess valuable experience in data modeling (Cassandra), data pipeline automation (Kafka and Spark Streams), and real-time analytics. Furthermore, I bring specialized expertise in US Debit (Pin and Signature) card payment processing, encompassing fee and compliance billing, pricing and network smart routing optimization, and merchant reporting.

Foreign Language
Goethe-Zertifikat A1: Start Deutsch 1 certified - Elementary German Proficiency. 
Completed the Goethe A2 course from Goethe Institute Bangalore.
